name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Leroy JONES, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Leroy JONES, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Stanley P. Stern, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 99
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Leroy JONES, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 22, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Stanley P. Stern, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
